name: Blitz (itch) (EthanTilley)
description:
Game Info:

Blitz is a 3D action game. The player controls the Robot Knight, a high tech sword fighter who uses his sword to defend himself in this hostile world. The player will dodge, or defeat enemies to progress through the game world. While also avoiding hazards such as, Lasers and Acid Pits. The aim of the player is not only to survive, but also achieve the highest possible score or lowest possible time. 

Create Your Own Levels!

Through the build that you download, in the data file you will find a file named 'streaming assets', in this file is all the default levels, you can open those levels in a text editor (Notepad++ recommended), and edit them yourselves. Here is a link to the Ascii Mapping Legend. Don't know how you would on mac (sorry). Any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me on tweeter: @EthanTiley_

Game Tips:

  • Sacrifice a health point through crossing over an acid pit for faster level time.
  • You're rewarded a heath point by collecting all enemies at the exit

Controls:

Arrow Keys: For In-Game Movement/Attacking.

ESC: Escape to menu. 

Mouse and Click for Menu Navagation
